sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"想要，打算"之意。
means: intend ： 较正式用词，但常用，指对未来的行动做出打算，并力争实现。
mean ： 口语多用，指怀有作某事的想法或希望得到某物，特别用于效果不好而动机良好的场合。

sentence.Network_en: England intend fielding their strongest team in next month's World Youth Championship.
sentence.Network_cn: 英格兰意欲在下月的世界青年锦标赛中推出他们的最强阵容。

sentence.Network_en: It's only fair to let her know that you intend to apply.
sentence.Network_cn: 告诉她你打算申请，这才算公平嘛。

sentence.Network_en: They intend to claim for damages against the three doctors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们打算向那3位医生索要损害赔偿。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... extent n 范围；程度 intend v 打算 intended a 故意的；打算中的.
英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... want 想要 intend 想要 refuse 拒绝.
六级高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... indulge v. 纵容，放任 97-1-46 intend v. 意欲 94-1-53 interpret v. 解释，说明 95-6-55.
新概念第二册单词表(附音标)_百度知道 ... pretend 假装，装得... intend 打算，企图，意指 attend 出席，参加；照应.

list.abs: 谁有初中英语短语、... ... bother to do sth / bother doing sth. 麻烦做某事 intend to do sth / intend doing sth. 想要做某事.
求翻译:我们下周打算去度假是什么意思? 我们下周打算去度假开始翻译参考译文1: We intend to go on vacation next week 参考译文2.
什么是“无缝区域经济”-英语点津 ... 反垄断调查 anti-monopoly probe 预定轨道 intended orbit 基层选举 grassroots election.
I intend a complete ascension in this lifetime ., 我意愿此生完全提升.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English entend (in the sense 'direct the attention to'), from Old French entendre, from Latin intendere 'intend, extend, direct', from in- 'towards' + tendere 'stretch, tend'

entry.def: If you intend to do something, you have decided or planned to do it.

example.ex: She intends to do A levels and go to university...
example.tran: 她计划先参加高级考试，然后去读大学。

example.ex: I didn't intend coming to Germany to work...
example.tran: 我没有打算来德国工作。

entry.tran: 准备,预留(作某种用途或给某人用)
entry.def: If something is intended for a particular purpose, it has been planned to fulfil that purpose. If something is intended for a particular person, it has been planned to be used by that person or to affect them in some way.

example.ex: This money is intended for the development of the tourist industry...
example.tran: 这笔钱准备用于旅游业的开发。

example.ex: Columns are usually intended in architecture to add grandeur and status...
example.tran: 圆柱在建筑中通常用来增添气势和显示地位。

entry.def: If you intend a particular idea or feeling in something that you say or do, you want to express it or want it to be understood.

example.tran: 他没有任何讽刺的意思。

example.ex: Burke's response seemed a little patronizing, though he undoubtedly hadn't intended it that way...
example.tran: 伯克的回答有点施恩与人的感觉,尽管他无疑并没有那个意思。

means.word_mean: 1. have in mind as a purpose;

sentences.sentence: "We thought to return early that night"
"She was intended to become the director"

means.word_mean: 3. mean or intend to express or convey;

sentences.sentence: "An example sentence would show what this word means"

auth_sentence.content: He says this indicates they intend to return there.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says this indicates they intend to return there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He says this indicates they intend to return there.

auth_sentence.content: We intend to let in a little fresh air.
auth_sentence.res_content: We intend to let in a little fresh air.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We intend to let in a little fresh air.

auth_sentence.content: We intend to build up Zion on the earth.
auth_sentence.res_content: We intend to build up Zion on the earth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We intend to build up Zion on the earth.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图

stems_affixes.value_cn: 嫩的, 温柔的, 软弱的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向+er→像伸出的幼芽→嫩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: attend[v.出席,参加]+ance表名词→n.出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
attend[v.出席,参加]+ant人→n.服务员;随从,随员
intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图
tend趋向+ency表名词→n.趋势,趋向;倾向
at加强+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→出席
con一起+tend伸展,趋向→一起伸展→竞争,斗争

stems_affixes.value_cn: 延长,延伸;扩充;给予;提供;估价
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→扩张
in内+tend伸展,趋向→内心伸出→想要

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假装,假托,借口,[在演戏中]装扮
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre预先,提前+tend伸展,趋向→提前展开,事先展开→假装,借口
pro前+tend伸展,趋向→v.[使]伸出, [使]伸展

stems_affixes.value_cn: 趋向,往往是;易于,往往会;照料,看护
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向→趋向做→易于,往往会

Sentence.sentence: Where did Lewis intend to park his car when he came back from work one night?
Worldwide people speak differently from the way they write, and texting -quick, casual and only intended to be read once — is actually a way of talking with your fingers.
Many professors think that giving out Apple iPhones or Internet-capable iPods to students may not benefit education as intended.
may not benefit education as intended

means.word_mean: 意欲, 打算，计划，想要

sentences.en: He did not intend paying the bill.
I intended the gift for you.
sentences.cn: 我打算把这礼物送给你。

sentences.en: I intend this article as teaching material.
sentences.cn: 我打算把这篇文章用作教材。

sentences.en: She intended that her daughter should study English.
sentences.cn: 她想让她的女儿学英语。

sentences.en: I don't think he intended her any disrespect.
sentences.cn: 我认为他对她没有不恭的意思。

sentences.en: a series of questions intended as a checklist
sentences.cn: 计划作为一览表的一系列问题

jushi.english: Does he intend marriage or is he only flirting with her?
jushi.chinese: 他是打算跟她结婚,还是仅仅跟她调情?
